attributes.action: We demand all GP Surgery's fully reopen.
attributes.additional_details: We have to work as normal in our jobs and so should they and they earn considerably more than the average worker. They are still taking there fat wages but providing appalling service to there patients.
attributes.background: Order all doctors back to full time face to face consultations.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Create a legal right for patients to receive timely face-to-face GP appointments: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
